data.text: A manâ€™s wisdom will lighten his countenance;
Observe the commandment of the king,
Be not hasty; thou shalt go forth out of his presence:
Even as a king having power:
He that keeps the commandment shall not know an evil thing:
For to everything there is time and judgment;
For there is no one that knows what is going to be:
There is no man that has power over the spirit
And then I saw the ungodly carried into the tombs,
Because there is no contradiction made
He that has sinned has done evil from that time,
But it shall not be well with the ungodly,
There is a vanity which is done upon the earth;
Whereupon I set my heart to know wisdom,
And I beheld all the works of God,
